trans-unit.source: Represents a set of one or more <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragment" /> elements.
trans-unit.target: Representa um conjunto de um ou mais elementos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragment" />.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments> element defines the structure and content of a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments> elemento define a estrutura e conteúdo de um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments> is the root of one or more <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragment> elements.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments> é a raiz de um ou mais <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragment> elementos.

trans-unit.source: For detailed information about the document structure of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)], see Chapter 9 and Appendix E of the *XML Paper Specification (XPS)* that can be downloaded from the [Windows Hardware Developer Central](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações detalhadas sobre a estrutura do documento de [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)], consulte o capítulo 9 e Apêndice E do *XML Paper Specification (XPS)* que pode ser baixado do [Central do desenvolvedor de Hardware do Windows](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments> element in an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments> elemento em um [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] documento.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragment" /> to add.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragment" /> a ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragment" /> to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragment" /> à coleção <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragment" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragment" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: This API is not implemented.
trans-unit.target: Essa API não está implementada.

trans-unit.source: This API is not implemented.
trans-unit.target: Essa API não está implementada.

trans-unit.source: This API is not implemented.
trans-unit.target: Essa API não está implementada.

trans-unit.source: This API is not implemented.
trans-unit.target: Essa API não está implementada.

trans-unit.source: The child object to add.
trans-unit.target: O objeto filho a ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Adds a child object to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments" />.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um objeto filho ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments" />.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação do membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele só pode ser usado quando a instância de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments> é convertida em uma interface de <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild>.

trans-unit.source: Only a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragment> can be a child of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments> and there must be at least one child.
trans-unit.target: Somente um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragment> pode ser um filho de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments> e deve haver pelo menos um filho.

trans-unit.source: The text to add to the object.
trans-unit.target: O texto a ser adicionado ao objeto.

trans-unit.source: Adds the text content of a node to the object.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o conteúdo do texto de um nó ao objeto.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação do membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele só pode ser usado quando a instância de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments> é convertida em uma interface de <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild>.
